mapper.sql: id, dictype_code, code, name, icon, enabled, create_time, update_time, creator, modifier, remark, language, default_value
mapper.update: update dictionary set enabled = #{enabled}, modifier = #{modifierName}, update_time = now() where (dictype_code = #{typeId}) or (code = #{typeId})
mapper.select: select id, dictype_code, code, name, icon, enabled, create_time, update_time, creator, modifier, remark, language, default_value from dictionary where code = #{code} order by create_time limit 1;
